description: Looking for a refreshing summer salad? This panzanella salad recipe is bursting with fragrant basil and juicy tomatoes and is handy for using up day-old bread.
name: Quick Panzanella Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place tomato and basil in a large bowl, drizzle generously with oil and season with pepper, then toss to combine. Just before serving, add bread and toss to combine.
